snippet.title: Monument Valley 2: The Lost Forest - official trailer
snippet.description:
The Lost Forest is a special chapter we have created for Monument Valley 2 to help protect trees, as a contribution to Playing for the Planet’s Green Game Jam.
 
Lost Forest sets out to remind players of the beauty of trees, and the importance of the preservation of our world’s forests as a crucial ally in the fight against climate change.  

With four new intimate scenes, we hope to inspire our players to give trees a voice, by signing the Play4Forests petition and declaring a shared interest in forest conservation. The Play4Forests campaign aims to bring 1 million signatures to key UN conferences and call on world leaders to play their part in forest conservation.

We hope you enjoy the new update and join us to help preserve our forests!

https://www.play4forests.org/en

=============================================

https://playing4theplanet.org/
https://playing4theplanet.org/news/gg...

Music by Todd Baker http://www.soundcirclemusic.com/
